BrionUnited States of AmericaI changed my hotel reservation for my stay at Oslo a couple of times from other highly rated hotels that had some reviews that were not quite right for me, mainly about noise. The Clarion Hotel Oslo was in my estimation about as perfect as I could imagine. The location is exceptional, near everything but not right in the middle of anything so it was supremely quiet. A short walk to the train station making it super convenient for in/outbound travel. The room was clean and the bed was very comfortable. The staff were super helpful and welcoming. The breakfast was huge, with something for everyone and was one of the best I've ever had! I was in for breakfast early so never had any problems, and observed that it got very busy later, so time it right and you'll enjoy an amazing meal. I fully intend to come back to Oslo and will 100% stay at the Clarion Hotel Oslo again - no need to look anywhere else for a quiet, comfortable room with a wonderful breakfast to kickstart a day.

name: Best Western and hotel
description: Best Western and hotel offers modern and compact accommodations in central Stockholm. AngelaUnited States of AmericaPerfect location - right off the main street on a quiet side street so no traffic noises, close to a metro stop, lots of stores and restaurants nearby. Breakfast was absolutely fantastic - great lactose and gluten free options and the variety far exceeded the standard "continental" fare (pancakes, various eggs, salad bar, fruit bar, juices, meats and cheeses, various breads and cakes, coffee/tea/cocoa, etc.). The common areas - bar, breakfast room, social room with tv and comfy chairs and couches, and the terrace/garden were exceptional. Not every Best Western has such a massive common area that is so well-stocked and suitable for all needs. The room came with plenty of space for hanging clothes and storing items - although it was small, as described, every available space was well-designed for utility.  The air conditioning worked very well - as long as you put your room key card into the slot on the wall marked "card" - everything was powered and you could take it out when you left to save energy (very common design).  Staff were absolutely perfect - very helpful and courteous - although there are automated self check-in options, it was fantastic to have an actual person available at all times in the event of questions or need.

MariaUnited States of AmericaLoved the plants, decor on the upper deck and the artsy vibe. The breakfast buffet had a very diverse selection of fresh and dried fruits, cereals, hard boiled eggs, yogurt and meat. Lots of options even if you’re gluten free. Also loved the kind service, the chef who made dinner was really skilled and the room was spacious. It was also nice to watch something on Netflix after a week away from home.
